search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Nanonets OCR (nanonets-ocr.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Nanonets OCR can be found at: [https://nanonets.com/pricing](https://nanonets.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
Important Update: Our pricing changed on January 31, 2025. For existing Nanonets customers, please reach out to your account manager for more information.

Start automating for free. All core features included in all plans.

Flexible pricing for every workflow need. Start for free.  

------------------------------------------------------------

![Image 1](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/602f5458a0b1d868c6c84d5b/679778a81fecebad060dbf97_fluent_gift-card-16-regular.svg)

### Start for free

$200 worth of credits in your account when you sign up to Nanonets.

![Image 2](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/602f5458a0b1d868c6c84d5b/679778a817b5b55f22f69c29_carbon_meter-alt.svg)

### Pay for what you use

No platform fees and fixed costs. Pay for each time a block runs in your workflow.

![Image 3](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/602f5458a0b1d868c6c84d5b/679778a85873a9341687c050_akar-icons_percentage.svg)

### Get volume discounts

Talk to our Sales team and  get volume pricing as your usage grows.

![Image 4](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/602f5458a0b1d868c6c84d5b/679778a8fabfd9f3bfe8e58c_carbon_wallet.svg)

### Save when you commit

Receive additional discounts for annual commitments.

standard billing

Pay as you go
-------------

Start for free with $200 in credits. Pay-as-you-go afterward, with simple per-block pricing and no commitments.

[Learn more](https://docs.nanonets.com/docs/consumption-based-billing)

Volume pricing tiers

Credits Accelerate
------------------

Scale your workflows with volume-based pricing and unlock the full potential of our premium features. Talk to our Sales team and get higher processing value with volume discounts.

[Learn more](https://docs.nanonets.com/docs/consumption-based-billing)

*   ![Image 5](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/602f5458a0b1d868c6c84d5b/6799f749ea702150ce12ca37_mingcute_receive-money-line.svg)Volume-based cost optimisation
    
*   ![Image 6](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/602f5458a0b1d868c6c84d5b/6799f75745c81bc20fdbc8fe_mingcute_building-1-line.svg)Team-wide credit sharing
    
*   ![Image 7](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/602f5458a0b1d868c6c84d5b/6799f708971c7e05d0c89faf_mingcute_diamond-2-line.svg)Unlock premium AI blocks
    
*   ![Image 8](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/602f5458a0b1d868c6c84d5b/6799f73955b6f09f0d74ab5e_mingcute_chart-line-line.svg)AI Reporting and Analytics
    

[Talk to Sales](https://nanonets.com/pricing#)

Get a demo and custom quote based on your volume needs

Custom solutions for Enterprise

If you’re a business with a large processing volume or unique business model, reach out to discuss alternative pricing options with add-ons.

[Talk to Sales](https://nanonets.com/pricing#)

How we calculate billing
------------------------

Create custom workflows using blocks for tasks like data extraction, data enrichment or export. You're charged based on usage - paying only when blocks actually run.

![Image 9](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/602f5458a0b1d868c6c84d5b/67986cbba93b7dd256887cdf_Vector%201.svg)

![Image 10](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/602f5458a0b1d868c6c84d5b/67986d3eae5242fe32f07153_Frame%201412067101.svg)

Block Price

Each workflow block run has a standard rate based on computing needs

![Image 11](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/602f5458a0b1d868c6c84d5b/67986e4e712abb90f3beb2e9_Close.svg)

![Image 12](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/602f5458a0b1d868c6c84d5b/67986d3ea0fbafe249f634b4_Frame%2014120671012.svg)

Usage

Pay for block runs as you process

[Learn about runs ![Image 13](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/602f5458a0b1d868c6c84d5b/67986ecea93b7dd2568a7d89_Arrow%20next.svg)](https://docs.nanonets.com/docs/consumption-based-billing#what-is-a-block-run)

![Image 14](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/602f5458a0b1d868c6c84d5b/67986cbb770fafd43da05dbb_Vector%202.svg)

![Image 15](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/602f5458a0b1d868c6c84d5b/67986fb50944bec2ab81f503_Add.svg)

![Image 16](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/602f5458a0b1d868c6c84d5b/67986d3e0944bec2ab7fffec_Frame%2014120671013.svg)

Add-ons

Optional features like role-based access and custom SLAs

![Image 17](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/602f5458a0b1d868c6c84d5b/67986fb5fa4700a93f7419e3_material-symbols_equal.svg)

![Image 18](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/602f5458a0b1d868c6c84d5b/67986d3ef1755bd21407b0cf_Frame%2014120671014.svg)

Your Price

Everything you need, nothing you don't

Core blocks and features
------------------------

A block is used to complete a task in your workflow. Build exactly what you need with our flexible feature set. Each block's price reflects its computing power needs to complete its task.  [Learn more](https://docs.nanonets.com/docs/consumption-based-billing#examples)

Pay as you go

Credits Accelerate

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

What is Workflow Automation?

![Image 198](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/602f5458a0b1d868c6c84d5b/679895179c74971ca6300794_icon.svg)

A workflow is a sequence of automated steps (blocks) that process your documents. For example, a typical invoice workflow might include importing PDFs, extracting data with AI, formatting dates, and exporting the results to your accounting system.

What are Blocks and Block Prices?

![Image 199](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/602f5458a0b1d868c6c84d5b/679895179c74971ca6300794_icon.svg)

Blocks are individual actions in your workflow, like extracting text from an invoice or formatting dates. Each block has a standard price based on its computing requirements - simpler tasks like formatting ($0.02/run) cost less than complex AI operations ($0.30/run).

How are block prices decided?

![Image 200](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/602f5458a0b1d868c6c84d5b/679895179c74971ca6300794_icon.svg)

Block prices are set based on the computational resources required. Simple operations like formatting cost less, while AI-powered tasks like data extraction cost more due to higher computing needs. Exact costs vary by document complexity and volume.

What are Credits

![Image 201](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/602f5458a0b1d868c6c84d5b/679895179c74971ca6300794_icon.svg)

Credits are a way to optimize your costs by prepaying for usage. Rather than paying your monthly usage directly, you can purchase Credits upfront at a discount. For example, you might pay $100,000 but receive $120,000 worth of Credits - an instant 20% savings. Credits are then automatically used to pay for your monthly processing costs. The more Credits you purchase or the longer you commit, the higher your discount. Contact our Sales team to learn about volume discount tiers for your specific needs.

How is Billing calculated?

![Image 202](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/602f5458a0b1d868c6c84d5b/679895179c74971ca6300794_icon.svg)

Billing is based on the number of times each block runs in your workflow. For example, if a lookup block processes 10 rows in a table, that counts as 10 runs. Total cost = (Number of runs × Block price)

How do I avail volume discounts?

![Image 203](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/602f5458a0b1d868c6c84d5b/679895179c74971ca6300794_icon.svg)

Contact our Sales team to access volume-based pricing tiers. Volume discounts can save up to 40% on block prices based on your monthly processing volume.

Trusted by the world's leading enterprises

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing is based on usage with a free tier offering $200 in credits. Volume discounts and custom enterprise solutions are available.

Usage-based pricing with no fixed costs.
